title: goat_milk_supplement_for_smallest_puppy
summary: Goat milk supplementation provided to the smallest puppy in the litter group.
description: Goat milk is being fed to the smallest puppy in the pen. The puppies were born as a group totaling 11 puppies. There are 2 mother dogs: one gave birth to 6 puppies and the other gave birth to 5 puppies. Both mother dogs help raise the puppies, and the puppies nurse from both mothers. This particular puppy is not growing as fast as the others and receives supplemental goat milk.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for verification convenience only and does not serve as a primary anchor.
